hanzi-su-wiki:
邦

Значения

Страна; нация

Мнемоника

Родная земля, в городах ⻏ которой — изобилие колосьев 丰 зерновых.
purpleculture_pinyin:
bāng
country; nation; state
страна; нация; государственный
rtega_mnemonic:
邦邦RSnation, country, state
  • RS. city 阝 and the cultivated land 丰 under its control: country
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A bountiful 丰 place 阝
purpleculture_examples:
联邦 [ lián bāng ]: federal; federation; commonwealth; federal union; federal state; union
邦交 [ bāng jiāo ]: relations between two countries; diplomatic relations
邻邦 [ lín bāng ]: neighboring state; adjacent country
友邦 [ yǒu bāng ]: friendly state; ally
乌托邦 [ wū tuō bāng ]: utopia (loanword)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 丰 [ fēng ] abundant, lush, bountiful, plenty
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
heisig_chinese_memo: He reminisced about his home nation: "Ah, back in my home nation, the bushes grew so high that they covered the city walls!".
koohiiStory1: He reminisced about his home country: "Ah, back in my home country, the bushes grew so high that they covered the city walls!".
koohiiStory2: It's easier if you think of the USA as the HOME COUNTRY. To the northern border you have it protected by BUSHES, while to south you have it protected by CITY WALLS (or a 800 mile long fence).
jp_example_words: 連邦(れんぽう): commonwealth, federation of states
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There are three slides sticking out of this building that lead to your home country. The rest of the slides go to other places, but three are yours.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine standing at the top of the building and looking down at the three slides that stretch off toward your home country. It takes a few hours to slide all the way there, but at the end you'll be home.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your home country is your home (ほう)!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Even if you move, even if you haven't been back in years, your home country will always be your home in some way, deep down.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the group's (⻏) ladder (丰) is in its home country
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: He reminisced about his home nation: "Ah, back in my home nation, the bushes grew so high that they covered the city walls!".
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts from " bundance " from " field ", like planting trees on the field boundary, which is the boundary. The font shape is similar to the ancient prose of " Shuowen ". Wang Guowei thought that the "㞢" form in the upper part of the ancient prose is the " feng " of the zi. The inscriptions from " Feng " from " Yi ", " Feng " or from " Soil ". See also " feng ", " feng ".

The original meaning of " state " is state and country. Oracle uses the original meaning, such as "Collection" 846: "Ding (Zhen): 𢎥 (do) 𠦪 (prayer) year in the country." "Bangtu" means "Bangshe", meaning the land god of the country.

Bronze inscriptions also use the original meaning, such as the historical wall plate: "You (fu) have up and down, and you (will) receive all nations." It means to own the world and the four directions. (Refer to Qiu Xigui) Another example is Yu Fangyi: "The emperor will not protect me for thousands of years."

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period also mean the state, such as "Guodianjian. "Laozi B" Jian 17: "You (repair) in a country, not (its) virtue (de) is Feng (abundance)." It means that when it is extended to the country, his virtue will be abundant. The handed down "Lao Tzu. "Chapter 54" is written as "The cultivation of the country, its virtue is abundance", avoiding the name of Liu Bang, the great ancestor of the Han Dynasty, changed " Bang " to " Guo ". Another example is "Shanghai Bo Zhushu II. "Lupin Drought" Jane 1 "Lupin Drought" means that a severe drought has occurred in Lu.

In ancient times, " Feng " and " Bang " are one word (Wang Guowei), and " Bang " also means enfeoffment. Such as "Shangbo Bamboo Book Eight. "Cheng Wang Ji Bang" Jian 1 "Wing Cheng Wang Ji Bang Zhougong two years", " Bang " is pronounced " Feng ", which means the second year of King Cheng Zhou Gong. Another example is "Tsinghua Jane II. "The Year" Jian 104: "Change the state of Chen and Cai Zhijun, and Fontaine (Envoy) will restore their own states." It means that the monarchs of Chen State and Cai State will be renamed and their respective states will be restored. Examples in ancient books handed down are like "Mo Zi. "Fei": "Uncle Tang and Lu Shangbang Qi and Jin."
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts from " bundance " from " field ", like planting trees on the field boundary, which is the boundary. The inscriptions from " Feng " from " Yi ", " Feng " or from " Soil ". The original meaning of " state " is state and country.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「丰」從「田」，象種樹於田界之上，以為疆界。字形與《說文》的古文相近，王國維以為古文上部的「㞢」形是「丰」之譌。金文從「丰」從「邑」，「丰」下或從「土」。參見「丰」、「封」。

　　「邦」的本義是邦國、國家。甲骨文用本義，如《合集》846：「鼎（貞）：𢎥（勿）𠦪（禱）年于邦土。」「邦土」即「邦社」，意謂邦國的土地之神。

　　金文亦用本義，如史牆盤：「匍（撫）有上下，䢔（會）受萬邦。」意謂擁有上天下地和四方萬國。（參裘錫圭）又如盠方彝：「天子不叚不其萬年保我萬邦。」

　　戰國竹簡也表示邦國，如《郭店簡．老子乙》簡17：「攸（修）之邦，丌（其）惪（德）乃奉（豐）。」意謂推廣至國家，他的德行就會豐盛。傳世本《老子．第五十四章》作「修之於國，其德乃豐」，避漢高祖劉邦名諱改「邦」為「國」。又如《上博竹書二．魯邦大旱》簡1「魯邦大旱」，意謂魯國發生大旱災。

　　古「封」、「邦」為一字（王國維），「邦」也表示分封。如《上博竹書八．成王既邦》簡1「成王既邦周公二年」，「邦」讀為「封」，意謂成王分封周公的第二年。又如《清華簡二．繫年》簡104：「改邦陳、蔡之君，囟（使）各復其邦。」表示改封陳國、蔡國的君主，使他們各自復國。傳世古書中的例子如《墨子．非攻下》：「唐叔與呂尚邦齊、晉。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「丰」從「田」，象種樹於田界之上，以為疆界。金文從「丰」從「邑」，「丰」下或從「土」。「邦」的本義是邦國、國家。

甲骨文從「 丰 」從「 田 」，象種樹於田界之上，以為疆界。字形與《說文》的古文相近，王國維以為古文上部的「 㞢 」形是「 丰 」之譌。金文從「 丰 」從「 邑 」，「 丰 」下或從「 土 」。參見「 丰 」、「 封 」。 「 邦 」的本義是邦國、國家。甲骨文用本義，如《合集》846：「鼎（貞）：𢎥（勿）𠦪（禱）年于邦土。」「邦土」即「邦社」，意謂邦國的土地之神。 金文亦用本義，如史牆盤：「匍（撫）有上下，䢔（會）受萬邦。」意謂擁有上天下地和四方萬國。（參裘錫圭）又如盠方彝：「天子不叚不其萬年保我萬邦。」 戰國竹簡也表示邦國，如《郭店簡．老子乙》簡17：「攸（修）之邦，丌（其）惪（德）乃奉（豐）。」意謂推廣至國家，他的德行就會豐盛。傳世本《老子．第五十四章》作「修之於國，其德乃豐」，避漢高祖劉邦名諱改「 邦 」為「 國 」。又如《上博竹書二．魯邦大旱》簡1「魯邦大旱」，意謂魯國發生大旱災。 古「 封 」、「 邦 」為一字（王國維），「 邦 」也表示分封。如《上博竹書八．成王既邦》簡1「成王既邦周公二年」，「 邦 」讀為「 封 」，意謂成王分封周公的第二年。又如《清華簡二．繫年》簡104：「改邦陳、蔡之君，囟（使）各復其邦。」表示改封陳國、蔡國的君主，使他們各自復國。傳世古書中的例子如《墨子．非攻下》：「唐叔與呂尚邦齊、晉。」

Wang Guowei thought that the " 㞢" form in the upper part of the ancient prose is the " feng" of the zi. The inscriptions from " Feng" from " Yi", " Feng" or from " Soil". See also " feng", " feng". The original meaning of " state" is state and country. Oracle uses the original meaning, such as "Collection" 846: "Ding (Zhen): 𢎥 (do) 𠦪 (prayer) year in the country." "Bangtu" means "Bangshe", meaning the land god of the country. Bronze inscriptions also use the original meaning, such as the historical wall plate: "You (fu) have up and down, and you (will) receive all nations." It means to own the world and the four directions. (Refer to Qiu Xigui) Another example is Yu Fangyi: "The emperor will not protect me for thousands of years." The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period also mean the state, such as "Guodianjian. "Laozi B" Jian 17: "You (repair) in a country, not (its) virtue (de) is Feng (abundance)." 邦字的基本解释

邦
bāng
国：友邦。邻邦。邦交（国和国之间的正式外交关系）。邦国（国家）。邦人（本国的人）。
国

邦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bāng］
［《廣韻》博江切，平江，幫。］
“峀1”的今字。亦作“邫1”。
(1)古代诸侯的封国。
(2)泛指国家。
(3)分封。
(4)地区；政区。
(5)“邦老”的省称。
(6)真腊国对兄与姊的称呼。柬埔寨语bang的音译。
(7)姓。孔子有弟子邦巽。见《史记·仲尼弟子列传》。

邦字的英文翻译

◎ 邦
nation, state

邦字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　邦； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1269第05
〔古文〕??邫【唐韻】博江切【集韻】【韻會】悲江切，?音梆。【說文】國也。【周禮·天官】大宰掌邦之六典，以佐王治邦國。【註】大曰邦，小曰國。　又【釋名】邦，封也。封有功于是也。【書·蔡仲之命】乃命諸王邦之蔡。　又姓。【正字通】明有邦嚴。　又叶卜工切，音崩。【詩·小雅】以畜萬邦，叶上訩。【又】保其家邦。叶上同。又【大雅】御于家邦。叶上恫，凡《詩》《易》邦字?同此音。

邦字的源字形

邦字的起名意思

：指古代诸侯的封国，后指指国家。

state
Basic explanation of words
state
bāng
Country: AIA. Neighbors. Diplomatic relations (official diplomatic relations between countries). State (country). Bangren (people from their own country).
country
state
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bāng］
["Guangyun" Bo Jiangqie, Pingjiang, Bang. ]
The present character for "峀1". Also known as "邫1".
(1) The feudal state of ancient princes.
(2) Refers to the country in general.
(3) Envelope.
(4) Region; political district.
(5) The provincial name of "Banglao".
(6) The name of brother and sister in Zhenla country. Transliteration of Cambodian bang.
(7) Last name. Confucius had his disciple Bang Xun. See "Historical Records · Biography of Zhongni's Disciples".
state
English translation of words
◎ Bang
nation, state
state

[Zhou Li·Tian Guan] Six Codes of the Great Ruler and Control of the State, to govern the State with the King. [Note] Big is the state, and the small is the country.　[Release name] Bang, Feng Ye. Feng Yougong is so. 【Book·Cai Zhong’s Fate】It is Cai who fate the kings and states.　Another last name. [Zhengzitong] Ming has a state of strictness.　 Ye Bu Gong cut again, the sound collapsed. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】With all the animals, the leaves are on the grass. [Also] Protect the family state. Same on Ye. And [Daya] Yu Yu Jiabang. Ye Shangxun, where the word "Poetry" and "Yi" Bang? The same pronunciation.

邦
bāng
本义是“国”。《尚书》:“协和
万邦”。中骨文“邦”字由“田”、
“丰”构成:“四”表示人们赖以生
活的地方,“丰”表声(古音相近)。
全文把“田”换成“邑”,“色”是人

们的聚居地。

油 料邦邦
OA广
государственный
Первоначальное значение - «страна».
«Шаншу»: «Конкорд Ванбанг».
Китайский иероглиф «Bang» состоит из «Tian» и «Feng»: «Four» относится к месту, где живут люди, а «Feng» представляет звук (древнее произношение аналогично).
В полном тексте «Тиан» заменяется на «И», а «Проиграть» - это место, где живут люди.
поле
Bonbon
OA Canton
bāng
I сущ.
1) государство, держава; штат; государственный, данной страны
友邦 дружественная держава
父母之邦 родная страна
联邦 федерация; федеративный
邦桀(杰) первый герой данной страны
邦宪 основные законы государства
2) ист. город-государство; феод. княжество, удел
II собств.
Бан (фамилия)
Radicals: 三, 丿, 阝  (three, slide, building)
Meaning Mnemonic
There are three slides sticking out of this building that lead to your home country. The rest of the slides go to other places, but three are yours.
Imagine standing at the top of the building and looking down at the three slides that stretch off toward your home country. It takes a few hours to slide all the way there, but at the end you'll be home.
Reading Mnemonic
Your home country is your home (ほう)!
Even if you move, even if you haven't been back in years, your home country will always be your home in some way, deep down.

ノ, 二 (два), 邦 (родная страна)
